definition: any of various types of fold formed by doubling fabric back upon itself and then pressing or stitching into shape, fold into pleats, 'Pleat the cloth'
details:
noun
- any of various types of fold formed by doubling fabric back upon itself and then pressing or stitching into shape
= synonyms: plait
verb
- fold into pleats, 'Pleat the cloth'
= synonyms: plicate
- pleat or gather into a ruffle
= synonyms: ruffle
